name: Bat-Battery
description:
LUDUMDARE39 

Info:

 You need to go to door for next world (there are 3) Destroying sheep is restore your poo .  You can swing your battery for protect yourself There is simple save system when you touch the door I will redesign levels of the game.

-----------------------------

CONTROLS:

  • A S W D = move
  • shift = rush
  • J = poo
  • K = wave
  • L = drop batter
